snippet.title: Wargroove - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Command an army, customize battlefields, and challenge your friends, in this richly detailed return to retro turn-based combat, available NOW on PC, Nintendo Switch, Xbox One & PS4!

Steam: https://bit.ly/2SpMR6R
Nintendo eShop: https://bit.ly/2FNE2hh
Xbox Store: https://bit.ly/2RYy2IK
PlayStation Store (EU): http://bit.ly/WargroovePS4EU
PlayStation Store (US): http://bit.ly/WargroovePS4US
Humble: https://bit.ly/2MLtAHx

For more information and to keep up to date with the latest development news, keep an eye on our dev blog. :)

Website: wargroove.com
Dev Blog: wargroove.com/blog

Facebook: facebook.com/wargroove
Twitter: twitter.com/wargroovegame
Reddit: reddit.com/r/wargroove
